name: greset
value:
git add -A
  git commit -qm 'CLEAN POINT'
  git reset HEAD~1 --hard
  git clean -f -d

name: ginit
value:
git init
  gi osx >> .gitignore
  echo 'READ.ME' >> README.md
  gcommit 'Initial'
  if test -n ${@}
    gconnect $repo_uri
    git push -u origin master
  end

name: gcommit
value:
git add -A
  if test -n '${@}'
        git commit -m '${@}'
    else
        git commit -m 'WIP'
    end

name: gmerge
value:
set merge_branch (git symbolic-ref HEAD | sed -e 's,.*/\(.*\),\1,')
  git checkout master
  gpull
  git rebase -i master
  git merge $merge_branch

name: gforget
value:
git rm -r --cached .
  git add .
  git commit -am 'Remove ignored files'

name: gmerge-ours
value:
set merge_branch (git symbolic-ref HEAD | sed -e 's,.*/\(.*\),\1,')
 git merge -s ours master
  git checkout master
  git merge $merge_branch
